Both depositAddress and depositHistory methods involve operations related to sub-account deposits, making depositHistory a suitable candidate for asserting the results of depositAddress.
After obtaining a deposit address, verifying the sub-account's assets can help ensure the deposit address is correctly associated with the sub-account.
